data.title: Air Codes
data.meta_description: Check this Awesome Aviation App! Available on the App Store
data.text:
2023 February 6

Coulson Aviation crash

An Boeing 737-300 owned by Coulson Aviation used as an air tanker, crashes at Fitzgerald River National Park in the Great Southern Region in Western Australia while fighting multiple fires. Both occupants onboard survive but sustain minor injuries. January 15

Yeti Airlines Flight 691

An ATR 72-500 with registration 9N-ANC, operating a domestic flight from Tribhuvan International Airport to Pokhara Airport crashed near Pokhara, Nepal. There were 68 passengers and four crew members. All 72 people were killed in the crash. January 2

Gold Coast mid-air collision

Two Eurocopter EC130 helicopters operated by Sea World Helicopters undertaking tourist trips collide over the city of Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia. There are 4 fatalities and 9 survivors. 2022 November 18

LATAM PerÃº Flight 2213

An A320neo-271N taking off from Jorge ChÃ¡vez International Airport to Juliaca, collided with a fire engine that was crossing the runway, killing two firefighters and injuring a third. All 102 passengers and 6 crew aboard escaped unharmed. November 6

Precision Air Flight 494

An ATR 42-500 flying a domestic flight from Dar Es Salaam, crash landed into Lake Victoria while attempting to land at Bukoba Airport, Tanzania. Of the 43 people on board, 19 were reportedly killed. October 23

Korean Air Flight 631

An Airbus A330-300 flying from Seoul-Incheon International Airport, overshot the runway on its third landing attempt at Mactan-Cebu International Airport, Philippines due to poor weather condition. There are no injuries among the 176 passengers and crew but the aircraft is damaged beyond repair alongside the ILS systems at the airport. September 4

Baltic Sea Cessna crash

A cessna citation 551 crashes due to unknown reasons into the Baltic sea. The plane was intercepted an was described as: "it entered a spiral". So far it was only found debris and oil on the water, but no sign of any survivors. July 16

Meridian Flight 3032

An Antonov An-12 carrying weapons and ammunition cargo from NiÅ¡, Serbia to Dhaka, Bangladesh, crashes near Kavala in Greece, killing all 8 on board. June 21

Red Air Flight 203

A McDonnell Douglas MD-82 operating a flight from Santo Domingo to Miami catches fire at Miami International Airport after landing due to the landing gear collapsing causing a runway excursion. There were three minor injuries among the 140 passengers and crew on board. The aircraft was written off. May 29

Tara Air Flight 197

A De Havilland Canada DHC-6 Twin Otter operating a flight from Pokhara to Jomsom, Nepal, crashes in poor weather conditions, killing all 22 on board. May 12

Tibet Airlines Flight 9833

An Airbus A319-100, aborts a take-off from Chongqing and veers off the runway. A fire erupts, but all 122 occupants evacuate safely. April 7

DHL Aero Expreso Flight 7216

A Boeing 757-27A PCF suffered hydraulic issues and overran the runway during an emergency landing, breaking in two. Nobody was seriously injured. March 21

China Eastern Airlines Flight 5735

A Boeing 737-800 operating a domestic flight from Kunming to Guangzhou, China, crashes into a mountainous region in Guangxi. The aircraft was carrying 132 occupants. February 26

AB Aviation Flight 1103

A Cessna 208D Grand Caravan operating a flight from Moroni to MohÃ©li, Comoros, crashes into the ocean while enroute. All 14 occupants aboard are killed. 2021 November 5

Piedade de Caratinga Beechcraft King Air crash

A Beechcraft King Air C-90B of PEC Aviation crashes 4 kilometers on approach to the Caratinga Airport, at Piedade de Caratinga, near Caratinga, Minas Gerais, Brazil, killing all 5 people on board. Among the victims was the Brazilian singer MarÃ­lia MendonÃ§a. November 3

Grodno Aviakompania Antonov An-12 crash

An An-12 of Grodno Aviakompania crashes whilst attempting to land at Irkutsk International Airport, Russia whilst operating a cargo flight. All 9 aboard are killed. November 2

An-26 of Optimum Aviation

An An-26 of Optimum Aviation crashes shortly after takeoff from Juba International Airport, South Sudan whilst operating a cargo flight. All 5 crew members are killed. October 19

2021 Houston MD-87 crash

In the 2021 Houston MD-87 crash, a McDonnell Douglas MD-87 aircraft crashes on take-off from Houston Executive Airport, Houston, Texas. All 21 people on board survive. September 12

Siberian Light Aviation Flight 51

A Let L-410 operating a domestic flight from Irkutsk to Kazachinskoye, Russia, crashes in a forest about 4 km short of the runway when it is attempting to land for a second time in heavy fog. 4 of the 16 occupants are killed and the 12 survivors are seriously injured. July 16

Siberian Light Aviation Flight 42

An Antonov An-28 operating a domestic flight from Kedrovy to Tomsk, Russia, makes a crash landing after takeoff, injuring 2 of the 18 passengers and crew on board. July 6

Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky Air Enterprise Flight 251

Antonov An-26 operating a domestic flight from Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky to Palana, Russia, crashes on approach. All 22 passengers and 6 crew are killed. July 2

Transair Flight 810

A Boeing 737-200C operating a domestic cargo flight in Hawaii between Honolulu, Oahu and the neighbouring island of Maui, suffers engine failure shortly after takeoff and ditches in the sea. Both pilots survive with injuries. May 23

Ryanair Flight 4978

A Boeing 737-800 operating an international scheduled passenger flight from Athens, Greece to Vilnius, Lithuania, is forced to land at Minsk, Belarus, escorted by a Belarusian Air Force MiG-29. Activist Roman Pratasevich, who was on board the aircraft, is arrested. May 12

Key Lime Air Flight 970

A Swearingen SA226 Metroliner operating a cargo flight, suffers a midair collision with a Cirrus SR22 on final approach to Denverâs Centennial Airport. The aircraft manages to make an emergency landing whilst the Cirrus crash-lands in a nearby field. All 3 people aboard the two aircraft survive. March 2

South Sudan Supreme Airlines Let L-410 Turbolet crashes

A South Sudan Supreme Airlines Let L-410 Turbolet crashes whilst operating a domestic flight from Pieri to Yuai, South Sudan. All 8 passengers and 2 crew are killed. February 20

United Airlines Flight 328

A Boeing 777-200, suffers an uncontained engine failure while climbing out of Denver International Airport. Debris from the engine falls into Denver neighborhoods. No injuries are reported. January 9

Sriwijaya Air Flight 182

Boeing 737-500 operating a domestic flight, crashed shortly after departure from SoekarnoâHatta International Airport in Jakarta, Indonesia. 2020 August 22

South West Aviation Antonov An-26

A South West Aviation Antonov An-26 crashes in a residential area after taking off for a charter cargo flight from Juba International Airport, South Sudan, killing at least 7 persons. August 7

Air India Express Flight 1344

Crashes in Karipur International Airport (Kozhikode), Kerala, India after skidding off the runway, killing both pilots and 17 passengers. May 22

Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303

An Airbus A320 enroute to Karachi from Lahore crashed in a residential neighborhood in Karachi minutes before attempted landing at Jinnah International Airport. There were 107 people onboard. May 7

Southwest Airlines Flight 1392

A Boeing 737-700, strikes a man on landing at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport, Austin, Texas. The man is killed but no one on the aircraft is hurt. May 4

East African Express Airways Brasilia crash

An East African Express Airways Embraer EMB 120 Brasilia crashes after being fired upon by Ethiopian ground forces during a charter cargo flight carrying pandemic relief supplies to Berdale, Somalia; all four passengers and two crew are killed. February 5

Pegasus Airlines Flight 2193

A Boeing 737-800 operating a domestic flight from Izmir to Istanbul Sabiha GÃ¶kÃ§en International Airport, overruns the runway on landing and drops down an embankment, breaking into several pieces. Of the 183 passengers and crew on board, 3 are killed and 179 are injured. January 27

Caspian Airlines Flight 6936

McDonnell Douglas MD-83, flying a domestic flight from Tehran, Iran overruns the runway on landing at Mahshahr Airport, Iran. The aircraft comes to a stop on a road injuring 2 of the 144 passengers and crew onboard. January 14

Delta Air Lines Flight 89

Delta Air Lines Flight 89, a Boeing 777-200 operated by Delta Air Lines dumps fuel over schools due to a compressor stall injuring 56. January 8

Ukraine International Airlines Flight 752

Boeing 737-800 bound for Kyiv, Ukraine, crashes shortly after taking off from Imam Khomeini International Airport in Tehran, Iran, after being hit by a surface-to-air missile launched by Iranian military forces; all 176 on board are killed. 2019 December 27

Bek Air Flight 2100

A Fokker 100 operating a domestic flight in Kazakhstan, crashes on takeoff from Almaty International Airport, killing 12 of the 98 people on board and injuring 54. November 24

Busy Bee Congo crash

A Busy Bee Dornier Do 228 crashes into a densely populated area shortly after takeoff from Goma International Airport in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, killing all 19 occupants of the aircraft and 10 people on the ground. October 17

PenAir Flight 3296

Saab 2000 flying from Anchorage, Alaska, United States, to Amaknak Island off the Alaskan coast, overshoots the runway after landing in erratic wind conditions, critically injuring three of the 42 people on board, one of whom dies the next day. October 4

Ukraine Air Alliance Flight 4050

Antonov An-12 en route from Spain to Turkey, crashes on approach to its intermediate stopover at Lviv International Airport in Ukraine, due to fuel exhaustion; five of the eight occupants are killed and the three survivors are seriously injured. August 15

Ural Airlines Flight 178

Airbus A321 bound for Simferopol, Crimea, suffers a double bird strike immediately after takeoff from Zhukovsky International Airport in Moscow, Russia, and performs an emergency belly landing in a cornfield; 74 of the 233 people on board are injured. June 27

Angara Airlines Flight 200

Antonov An-24 operating a domestic flight in Russia, suffers an in-flight engine failure and lands at Nizhneangarsk Airport where it overshoots the runway and crashes into a building; all 43 passengers survive but two of the four crew members are killed. May 13

Alaska mid-air collision

A Taquan Air de Havilland Canada DHC-3 Turbine Otter floatplane collides in mid-air with a Mountain Air Service de Havilland Canada DHC-2 Beaver floatplane, while both are operating sightseeing flights over George Inlet, Alaska, United States; the DHC-2 pilot and all four passengers are killed; the DHC-3 makes an emergency water landing with the loss of one of its 10 passengers. May 8

Biman Bangladesh Airlines Flight 60

Bombardier Q400 inbound from Shahjalal International Airport in Bangladesh, overshoots the runway in bad weather at Yangon International Airport, Myanmar; all 33 people on board survive but 18 are injured. May 5

Aeroflot Flight 1492

Sukhoi Superjet 100 operating a domestic flight in Russia, suffers an inflight emergency shortly after departing from Sheremetyevo International Airport, Moscow, and returns to the airport where it burns out after landing; 41 of the 78 people on board perish. May 3

Miami Air Flight 293

Boeing 737-81Q operating a flight from GuantÃ¡namo Bay, Cuba, to Florida, United States, overshoots the runway on landing at Naval Air Station Jacksonville during a thunderstorm; all 143 passengers and crew survive the accident. March 10

Ethiopian Airlines Flight 302

Boeing 737 MAX 8 bound for Nairobi, Kenya, crashes near Bishoftu, Ethiopia, shortly after taking off from Addis Ababa's Bole International Airport, due to a potential design flaw in the flight control system; all 157 people on board perish. March 9

Colombia DC-3 crash

A Laser AÃ©reo Douglas DC-3 crashes while attempting to land at La Vanguardia Airport, Villavicencio, Colombia, killing all 11 passengers and three crew members on board the aircraft. February 24

Biman Bangladesh Airlines Flight 147

Boeing 737-800 flying from Bangladesh to Dubai, undergoes an attempted hijacking and makes an emergency landing at Shah Amanat International Airport in Chittagong; all passengers are safely evacuated and the perpetrator is shot dead by Bangladeshi special forces. February 23

Atlas Air Flight 3591

A Boeing 767 en route from Miami, Florida, to Houston, Texas, United States, crashes into Trinity Bay on approach to Houston's George Bush Intercontinental Airport, killing both crew members and the single passenger on board. January 14

Saha Airlines Boeing 707 crash

A Saha Airlines Boeing 707 crashes after overshooting the runway at Fath Air Base in Iran, when the crew attempts to land at the wrong airport; 15 of the 16 people on board lose their lives. 2018 November 9

Fly Jamaica Airways Flight 256

Boeing 757-200, crash lands after returning to Cheddi Jagan International Airport, Guyana, after suffering a hydraulic failure 45 minutes after takeoff en route to Toronto. All on board initially survive, but one passenger dies a week later due to injuries sustained in the crash. October 29

Lion Air Flight 610

Boeing 737 MAX 8, crashes into the Java Sea shortly after takeoff from SoekarnoâHatta International Airport in Jakarta en route to Depati Amir Airport in Pangkal Pinang, Indonesia. All 181 passengers and eight crew are killed. September 28

Air Niugini Flight 73

Boeing 737-800, lands short of the runway and comes to rest in a lagoon at Chuuk International Airport in the Federated States of Micronesia, one passenger dies whilst 34 passengers and 12 crew escape without serious injuries. September 9

Yirol Let L-410 Turbolet crash

A Let L-410 Turbolet crashes into a lake in Yirol, South Sudan, killing 20 of the 23 passengers and crew on board. September 1

Utair Flight 579

Boeing 737-800, overshoots the runway and catches fire while landing in Sochi International Airport, injuring 18 people. One airport employee dies of a heart attack. August 16

Xiamen Airlines Flight 8667

Boeing 737-800, crash-lands at Ninoy Aquino International Airport amidst heavy monsoon rains while landing runway 06/24. The aircraft skids off the end of the runway. All 157 passengers and eight crew are unharmed. August 10

Horizon Air Q400 incident

A Horizon Air Bombardier Dash 8 Q400 aircraft registered N449QX, is stolen from SeattleâTacoma International Airport with no passengers on board and later crashes on Ketron Island, killing the sole occupant. August 4

Ju-Air Junkers Ju 52 crash

A Ju-Air Junkers Ju 52 crashes near Piz Segnas, Switzerland, killing all 20 on board. July 31

AeromÃ©xico Connect Flight 2431

Embraer ERJ-190AR, crashes into wooded terrain in Durango shortly after take-off from Durango International Airport. The aircraft is destroyed, but all 99 passengers and four crew survive. July 28

Air Vanuatu Flight 241

ATR 72-500, skids off the runway after a flight from Tanna to Port Villa, Vanuatu. 13 of the 43 people on board suffer minor injuries. June 28

UY Aviation King Air C90 crash

A Beechcraft King Air C90 crashes at Jagruti Nagar, India, killing all four people on the aircraft and one person on the ground. May 18

Cubana de AviaciÃ³n Flight 972

Boeing 737-200/Adv, crashes shortly after takeoff from JosÃ© MartÃ­ International Airport in Havana, Cuba. 112 of the 113 passengers and crew are killed; the sole survivor is seriously injured. May 14

Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633

Airbus A319-100, makes an emergency landing at China's Chengdu Shuangliu Airport after part of the cockpit windshield fails; all 128 passengers and crew survive the incident. April 17

Southwest Airlines Flight 1380

Boeing 737-700 en route over Bernville, Pennsylvania, suffers an engine failure at cruise altitude. Some debris enters the fuselage, causing substantial damage to the aircraft and loss of cabin pressure. The crew safely diverts to Philadelphia International Airport. One passenger is killed; another seven are injured. March 12

US-Bangla Airlines Flight 211

Bombardier Q400 on an international flight from Dhaka to Nepal, crashes at Tribhuvan International Airport; 52 of the 71 people on board are killed. March 11

Iran Bombardier Challenger crash

A Bombardier Challenger 604 private jet crashes in the Zagros Mountains, Iran, killing all 11 people on board. February 18

Iran Aseman Airlines Flight 3704

An ATR 72-200 on a domestic flight in Iran, crashes into the Zagros Mountains killing all 60 passengers and six crew members on board. February 11

Saratov Airlines Flight 703

An Antonov An-148 crashes shortly after taking off from Domodedovo International Airport, Russia. All 71 passengers and crew are killed. January 13

Pegasus Airlines Flight 8622

Boeing 737-800, skids off the end of the runway at Trabzon Airport, Turkey and comes to rest on a cliff. All 168 passengers and crew survive without injury. The aircraft is written off. 2017 December 31

Nature Air Flight 9916

Cessna 208 Caravan crashes shortly after takeoff from Punta Islita Airport, Costa Rica. All 12 passengers and crew on board are killed. December 13

West Wind Aviation Flight 280

ATR 42-300, crashes shortly after takeoff from Fond-du-Lac Airport, Saskatchewan, Canada. Of the 25 passengers and crew on board, all initially survive, but one passenger dies of his injuries in the hospital 12 days later. November 15

Khabarovsk Airlines Flight 463

Let L-410 Turbolet, crashes short of the runway at Nelkan Airport in Russia, killing four of the five passengers and both crew members. October 14

Valan International Antonov An-26 crash

In the 2017 Valan International Antonov An-26 crash, an Antonov An-26 crashes into the sea just short of Abidjan's FÃ©lix HouphouÃ«t Boigny International Airport, Ivory Coast. Four of the ten occupants are killed. September 30

Air France Flight 66

Airbus A380, suffers an uncontained engine failure and makes an emergency landing at Goose Bay Airport, Newfoundland & Labrador, Canada. No one is killed or injured. July 7

Air Canada Flight 759

Airbus A320, nearly lands on a taxiway occupied by four jets at SFO 28R. No one is killed or injured. May 27

Summit Air (Nepal) Flight 409

Let L-410 operating a cargo flight crashes short of Lukla Airport, Nepal in poor visibility. Two of the three crew members are killed, one of whom dies later in hospital. April 29

Aerogaviota Antonov An-26 crash

An Antonov An-26 crashes into a mountain whilst on a military charter flight from Gustavo Rizo Airport, Cuba. All eight on board are killed. March 28

Peruvian Airlines Flight 112

Boeing 737-300, is burnt out following the collapse of the landing gear at Francisco Carle Airport, Jauja. All 150 people on board survive. March 20

South Supreme Airlines Antonov An-26 crash

In the 2017 South Supreme Airlines Antonov An-26 crash, an Antonov An-26 crashes on landing at Wau Airport, South Sudan. All 40 passengers and five crew members survive. January 16

Turkish Airlines Flight 6491

Boeing 747-400F, crashes into a residential area upon attempting landing in thick fog in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan. The four crew members and 35 people on the ground are killed. 2016 December 23

Afriqiyah Airways Flight 209

Airbus A320-214, is hijacked by two Gaddafi supporters and forced to land at Malta Airport. After several hours, all passengers and crew are released and the hijackers surrender. December 20

Aerosucre Flight 157

Boeing 727-200, crashes while failing to take off from Puerto CarreÃ±o en route to Bogota, Colombia. Only one survives of the six crew members on board. December 7

Pakistan International Airlines Flight 661

ATR-42-500, crashes at Havelian while en route from Chitral to Islamabad. All 42 passengers and five crew members are killed in the accident. November 28

LaMia Flight 2933

An Avro RJ85 crashes at Cerro Gordo en route to MedellÃ­n, Colombia. It was carrying the Brazilian football team Chapecoense. Only six survive among 77 passengers and crew. October 31

Alfa Indonesia DHC-4 crash

A DHC-4T Turbo Caribou operating a cargo flight to Ilaga Airport, Indonesia crashes in the Ilaga Pass. All four crew members are killed. October 28

FedEx Express Flight 910

McDonnell Douglas MD-10-10F, skids off the runway after the landing gear collapses on landing at Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport; the left wing is severely damaged in a post-crash fire but both pilots survive. October 28

American Airlines Flight 383

Boeing 767-300ER, suffers an uncontained engine failure and fire at Chicago O'Hare Airport. Twenty of the 170 people on board suffer injuries. August 27

Southwest Airlines Flight 3472

Boeing 737 suffers an uncontained engine failure over the Gulf of Mexico causing substantial damage to the aircraft and loss of cabin pressure. The aircraft lands safely at Pensacola International Airport, there are no injuries among the 104 on board. August 5

ASL Airlines Hungary Flight 7332

Boeing 737 overruns a runway on landing at Orio al Serio International Airport; both pilots survive. August 3

Emirates Flight 521

Boeing 777-300 lands wheels-up at Dubai International Airport. Shortly after landing, the plane bursts into flames. All 300 passengers and crew escape from the aircraft unharmed; one firefighter is killed by an explosion. June 27

Singapore Airlines Flight 368

Boeing 777-300ER, suffers an engine fire at Singapore Changi Airport after returning due to a fuel leak. All 241 passengers and crew are unharmed. May 27

Korean Air Flight 2708

Boeing 777-300, suffers an engine failure and resulting fire while taxiing for takeoff at Haneda Airport; all 319 passengers and crew are evacuated although 12 are injured. May 19

EgyptAir Flight 804

Airbus A320, crashes into the eastern Mediterranean Sea after a series of sharp descending turns. All 56 passengers and 10 crew are killed. May 18

Silk Way Airlines Antonov An-12 crash

Silk Way Airlines Antonov An-12 cargo plane crashes after an engine failure, killing seven and injuring two. April 29

CHC Helikopter Service Flight 241

In the 2016 TurÃ¸y helicopter crash, a Eurocopter EC225L Super Puma helicopter crashes near TurÃ¸y, an island off the coast of Norway. All 13 passengers and crew are killed. April 4

Batik Air Flight 7703

Boeing 737-800, collides with an ATR 42 on the runway at Halim Perdanakusma Airport in Jakarta. Both aircraft are substantially damaged. All 60 on board survive. March 29

EgyptAir Flight 181

Airbus A320, is hijacked and forcibly diverted to Larnaca International Airport, Cyprus. All passengers and crew are released unharmed. March 19

Flydubai Flight 981

Boeing 737-800, crashes while landing at Rostov-on-Don, Russia, in poor weather. All 62 people on board are killed. March 9

True Aviation An-26 crash

Antonov An-26 crashes into the sea whilst trying to return to Cox's Bazar Airport, Bangladesh after an engine failure. Three of the four crew are killed. February 26

Air Kasthamandap PAC 750XL crash

In the 2016 Air Kasthamandap crash, an Air Kasthamandap PAC 750XL crash-lands in Nepal, killing the two crew members and injuring nine passengers. February 24

Tara Air Flight 193

Viking Air-built DHC-6 Twin Otter, flies into a storm and crashes into a mountainside at Dana, Myagdi district, Nepal, killing all 23 on board. February 2

Daallo Airlines Flight 159

An Airbus A321 suffers an explosion shortly after taking off from Aden Adde International Airport, Somalia. Two people are injured and one, the suspected suicide bomber, is killed after falling from the aircraft. January 8

West Air Sweden Flight 294

Bombardier CRJ200 cargo freighter, crashes while in cruise near Akkajaure in Sweden. Both crew members on board are killed. 2015 December 24

Services Air Airbus A310 crash

An Airbus A310-300F overshoots the runway at Mbuji-Mayi Airport, Democratic Republic of the Congo due to a brake failure. The five crew survive but eight on the ground are killed. November 22

Avia Traffic Company Flight 768

Boeing 737-300, touches down hard at Osh Airport injuring 8, and causing all landing gears to be ripped off. The aircraft skids off the runway and the left engine is ripped off. November 4

Juba An-12 crash

An Allied Services Ltd. Antonov An-12 crashes near the White Nile shortly after takeoff from Juba International Airport, killing 37 of 39 on board. October 31

Metrojet Flight 9268

An Airbus A321 explodes in mid-air over the Sinai Peninsula due to a terrorist bomb, 23 minutes after takeoff from Sharm-El-Sheikh, killing all 224 passengers and crew on board. October 29

Dynamic Airways Flight 405

Boeing 767-200, erupts in flames while preparing for take-off at Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport. All 101 passengers and crew on board survive, but 21 people are injured. October 2

Aviastar Flight 7503

DHC-6 Twin Otter, crashes on a mountain 11 minutes after take-off over Palopo, Indonesia, killing all 10 passengers and crew on board. September 8

British Airways Flight 2276

A Boeing 777-200 aborts takeoff at McCarran International Airport, Las Vegas, NV following an engine fire. All 189 passengers and crew are evacuated safely. September 5

Senegal mid-air collision

Boeing 737-800 collides in a mid-air with a BAe 125 air ambulance operated by Senegalair over eastern Senegal. The BAe 125 crashes in the Atlantic killing all seven on board, while the 737 lands safely without any injuries to those on board. August 16

Trigana Air Flight 267

An ATR-42 crashes while en route from Sentani Airport, to Oskibil Airport in the eastern Indonesian province of Papua. All 49 passengers and five crew members are killed in the crash in the worst aviation accident ever involving the ATR-42. April 25

Turkish Airlines Flight 1878

An Airbus A320 is severely damaged in a landing accident at AtatÃ¼rk International Airport. All 102 passengers and crew on board are evacuated without injury. April 14

Asiana Airlines Flight 162

Airbus A320, crashes short of the runway and hits a localizer while landing at Hiroshima Airport, en route from Seoul. All 82 passengers and crew on board survive, but 27 are injured. April 13

Carson Air Flight 66

Swearingen Metro II crashes into a mountain en route to Prince George Airport, British Columbia. Both crew members are killed. March 29

Air Canada Flight 624

An Airbus A320 crashes short of the runway and hits power lines while landing at Stanfield International Airport, en route from Toronto. All 138 passengers and crew on board survive, with 23 treated for minor injuries. March 24

Germanwings Flight 9525

Airbus A320 crashes in southern France en route from Barcelona, Spain to DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany as a result of a deliberate act by the first officer. All 144 passengers and six crew on board the aircraft die in the crash. March 5

Delta Air Lines Flight 1086

A McDonnell Douglas MD-88 skids off the runway at LaGuardia Airport and crashes into a fence, coming inches from Flushing Bay. Several people are injured, but there are no fatalities. February 4

TransAsia Airways Flight 235

An ATR-72, stalls on takeoff and crashes into the Keelung River in Taiwan after striking the Huandong Viaduct and a passing taxi. 43 of the 58 passengers and crew on board are killed. 2014 December 28

Indonesia AirAsia Flight 8501

Airbus A320 en route from Surabaya, Indonesia to Singapore, crashes into waters off Borneo, killing all 155 passengers and seven crew on board. October 29

Skyway Enterprises Flight 7101

A Short 360 operating a charter flight for FedEx crashes into Maho Bay shortly after takeoff from Princess Juliana International Airport, Saint Martin. Both crew members are killed. August 10

Sepahan Airlines Flight 5915

HESA IrAn-140 (an Antonov An-140 built under license) crashes shortly after takeoff from Mehrabad International Airport, Iran, killing 39 of the 48 people on board. July 24

Air AlgÃ©rie Flight 5017

A chartered Swiftair McDonnell Douglas MD-83 operating for Air AlgÃ©rie en route from Burkina Faso to Algiers, crashes in the northern Mali desert after disappearing from radar approximately 50 minutes after takeoff, killing all 110 passengers and six crew members on board. July 23

TransAsia Airways Flight 222

An ATR-72 en route from Kaohsiung to Penghu, Taiwan, crashes during go-around, killing 48 of the 58 people on board. July 17

Malaysia Airlines Flight 17

A Boeing 777 en route from Amsterdam to Kuala Lumpur, is shot down over eastern Ukraine, killing all 283 passengers and 15 crew on board in the deadliest civilian airliner shootdown incident. March 8

Malaysia Airlines Flight 370

A Boeing 777 en route from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing with 227 passengers and 12 crew on board, disappears from radar over the Gulf of Thailand. A wing part was later found in RÃ©union. February 17

Ethiopian Airlines Flight 702

Boeing 767 is hijacked by the co-pilot while en route from Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to Rome, Italy, but lands safely at Geneva, Switzerland. All 202 passengers and crew aboard are unharmed. February 16

Nepal Airlines Flight 183

De Havilland Canada DHC-6, crashes near Khidim about 74 kilometres southwest of Pokhara, Nepal, killing all 18 people on board. 2013 November 29

LAM Mozambique Airlines Flight 470

Embraer 190 en route from Maputo International Airport, Mozambique, to Quatro de Fevereiro Airport, Angola crashes into Bwabwata National Park in northern Namibia, killing all 33 people on board. November 17

Tatarstan Airlines Flight 363

Boeing 737, crashes at Kazan International Airport, Russia, during a go-around, killing all 50 people on board. October 16

Lao Airlines Flight 301

ATR-72 crashes shortly before landing at Pakse International Airport under adverse weather conditions, killing all 44 passengers and five crew on board. October 3

Associated Aviation Flight 361

An Embraer 120 crashes shortly after takeoff from Murtala Muhammed International Airport, Lagos, killing 15 people on board. August 14

UPS Airlines Flight 1354

Airbus A300 freighter, crashes short of the runway on approach to BirminghamâShuttlesworth International Airport, killing the two crew on board. July 22

Southwest Airlines Flight 345

Boeing 737 hard landing at La Guardia in New York. Resulted in collapsed landing gear and total airframe loss. Multiple injuries. No fatalities. July 7

Rediske Air DHC-3 Otter crash

A de Havilland Canada DHC-3 operated by Rediske Air crashes on approach to Soldotna Airport, Alaska, killing all 10 people on board. July 6

Asiana Airlines Flight 214

Boeing 777, crashes short of the runway on landing at San Francisco International Airport, killing three of 307 on board and injuring 182. The crash was the first fatal accident involving the Boeing 777. June 10

Merpati Nusantara Airlines Flight 6517

Xian MA60 crashes on landing at El Tari Airport, Indonesia, injuring five people. May 16

Nepal Airlines Flight 555

De Havilland Canada DHC-6, overruns the runway on landing at Jomsom Airport, Nepal, injuring seven people. April 29

National Airlines Flight 102

Boeing 747 freighter, stalls and crashes shortly after takeoff from Bagram Airfield, Afghanistan, due to load shifting, killing all seven crew members on board. April 13

Lion Air Flight 904

Boeing 737 carrying 101 passengers and seven crew members, crashes into the ocean while attempting to land at Ngurah Rai International Airport on the Indonesian island of Bali, injuring 46 people. March 8

ACE Air Cargo Flight 51

Beechcraft 1900C-1 crashes into a mountain whilst on approach into Dillingham Municipal Airport, Alaska. Both crew and the passengers were killed. March 4

Compagnie Africaine d'Aviation Fokker 50 crash

In poor weather conditions on approach to Goma International Airport, Democratic Republic of the Congo, killing all five crew and one of the four passengers. February 13

South Airlines Flight 8971

An Antonov An-24 crash-lands in dense fog at Donetsk International Airport, Ukraine, killing five of 52 people on board. January 29

SCAT Airlines Flight 760

Bombardier CRJ200, crashes in thick fog on approach to Almaty International Airport, Kazakhstan, killing all 16 passengers and five crew on board. 2012 December 29

Red Wings Airlines Flight 9268

Tupolev Tu-204 on a re-positioning flight, overruns the runway on landing at Moscow's Vnukovo International Airport, then breaks apart and catches fire; five of the eight crew on board are killed in the first fatal accident involving the Tu-204. December 25

Air Bagan Flight 11

Fokker 100 crash-lands on a road near Heho Airport, Myanmar, killing one on board, one on the ground and injuring 11. December 17

Amazon Sky An-26 crash

The 2012 Amazon Sky An-26 crash kills a crew of four, when the aircraft hits the ground while crossing the Andes. November 30

AÃ©ro-Service Ilyushin Il-76 crash
